description: Luxurious long-sleeve red robe with satin finish

core:description.text: A striking long-sleeve robe in vibrant red, crafted from lightweight satin with a noticeably lustrous finish. The relaxed, open-front design features a soft shawl-style collar that drapes elegantly across the shoulders. No belt or piping interrupts the clean lines of this flowing garment, which catches and reflects light beautifully with every movement. The smooth, silky fabric glides against the skin, offering both comfort and a touch of luxury.
